column4: Is it necessary to have a swap partition for ubuntu and how large should it be?
good idea of ay least ram id you want to suspend

sipior: I'haven't created swap partition when i installed system and now I see ubuntu can't manage memory. I got 2gb ram and system freezes always when it's full. And it's getting full fast. It's never cleared. I know there is probably nothing that can be done about it.
